874860.name: Fantasy Grounds - Devin Night 105: Heroic Characters 20 (Token Pack)
874860.description:
Devin Night 105: Heroic Characters 20

This pack contains humans in various fantastic roles.
This product contains:
  • Female Human Battle Cleric
  • Female Human Moon Druid
  • Female Human Scyther
  • 4 Female Human Warriors
  • Male Human Assassin
  • 2 Male Human Barbarians
  • Male Human Bardalier
  • Male Human Berserker
  • Male Human Blue Paladin
  • Male Human Blue Wizard
  • Male Human Channeler
  • Male Human Chaos Mage
  • Male Human Conjurer
  • Male Human Fighter
  • Male Human Grey Rogue
  • Male Human Gunslinger
  • Male Human Inquisitor
  • Male Human Investigator
  • Male Human Knight
  • Male Human Mage
  • Male Human Monk
  • Male Human Paladin
  • Male Human Pale Anti-Paladin
  • Male Human Summoner
  • Male Human Wizard
  • Male Human High Priest
  • Male Noble Archer
  • Male Noble Archer Dark
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: James Holloway[/b]
